articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the updated Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory.
					 He went round the monument to the on-the-spot instructions given by President Kim Il Sung, the monument to his field guidance, the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room devoted to the history of the factory, conducted by leading officials of the factory. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung provided field guidance to the factory 15 times since he paid his first visit to the factory on September 24, 1945 right after he liberated the country and made his triumphant return home, clearly indicating the road to be followed by it.
					
					 After looking back with deep emotion on the glorious path covered by the factory in its development, Kim Jong Il said that the factory has turned into a large food processing center under the wise leadership and deep care of the President. 
					
					 Then he went round different shops to learn in detail about the updating of the factory and production there.
					
					 He praised the workers of the factory for having completed the updating by their own efforts in a short span of time and waged a dynamic drive for increasing the production of foodstuff including varieties of confectionary meeting the taste of people.
					
					 The factory has an important role to play for improving the diet of the citizens, he said, setting forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for managing and operating the factory.
					
					 Whether the citizens of Pyongyang are supplied with greater quantities of confectionary and other foodstuff or not entirely depends on the role of the factory, he noted, adding that the most important task facing the factory is to realize the modernization and scientification of the production processes at a high level.
					
					 Noting that many factories and enterprises in Jagang and North Phyongan Provinces and other areas of the country are now advancing at a rapid tempo by successfully putting their production on a CNC basis and pushing back the frontiers of science, he put forth militant tasks to be fulfilled by the factory to wind up its modernization in the shortest possible time as required by the IT age.
					
					 In order to turn the factory into a modern model foodstuff factory based on the latest science and technology, officials and technicians of the factory should plan any work in a big way and dynamically push ahead with it with an innovative eye and, at the same time, Kim Chaek University of Technology and other universities and scientific research institutions should help them in the work in a responsible manner from the standpoint of a master, he urged.
					
					 He pointed out that in order to keep the production going at a high rate it is necessary to take thorough measures for the supply of raw materials, specifying the orientation and ways to do so. 
					
					 He earnestly called on the officials, workers and technicians of the factory to satisfactorily perform their honorable mission to provide the people with a more plentiful life at an early date.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Yong Rim, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, and Kim Kyong Hui, Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and Pak Myong Son, vice-premier of the Cabinet.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Swimming Pool of Kim Il Sung Univ.
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Swimming Pool of Kim Il Sung Univ.
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the Swimming Pool of Kim Il Sung University to watch its teachers and students in swimming training.
					 Watching the teachers and students swimming in the spacious swimming and wading pools full of joy, he was greatly pleased to see the swimming pool of the university fully available for everybody's physical training and cultural rest.
					
					 Recalling that President Kim Il Sung made so much effort for the education of the rising generation all his life, he said with emotion how greatly he would have been pleased if he had watched those teachers and students fully enjoying happiness at the best swimming pool. 
					
					 Swimming is a very good exercise for training physical bodies and promoting health, he said, indicating tasks and ways for popularizing the swimming.
					
					 Underscoring the need to successfully manage and operate the swimming pool of the university as it is an eternal edifice for posterity, he once again paid attention to every aspect of the pool and took measures with loving care.
					
					 He highly appreciated the shining feats performed by Kim Il Sung University, noting that over the last more than six decades it  has trained a large number of revolutionary talented persons in the crucible of the arduous revolutionary struggle, thus creditably playing a pivotal role in implementing the nation's policy on training native cadres and policy on turning all members of society into intellectuals and graduates from this university, in particular, are now successfully performing a pace-setter's role in every work site for building a thriving nation including the work for putting production processes on a Juche-oriented CNC basis. 
					
					 He noted that it is necessary to successfully train the students into revolutionary talented persons equipped with knowledge, a good moral character and good health as they are precious treasures who would shoulder upon themselves the future of the country, stressing the need for the university to pay deep attention to their life at all times.
					
					 After learning about the progress made in the construction of a library of the university now under way, he called for completing the project at the best level and presenting it to the younger generation as early as possible.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the teachers and students of the university would creditably perform their heavy yet honorable mission and tasks in the future, too, and thus more strikingly demonstrate the dignity of the university going by the august name of the President. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, and Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek and Pak Nam Gi, department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK on US Envoy's Pyongyang Visit
articles.content:
DPRK on US Envoy's Pyongyang Visit
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Friday gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA as regards the DPRK visit by the U.S. special representative for DPRK policy and his party:
					 Stephen Bosworth, U.S. special representative for DPRK policy, and his party visited Pyongyang from Dec. 8 to 10. During their stay they had talks with the vice-minister for U.S. affairs of the DPRK Foreign Ministry and its first vice-minister met with them. 
					
					 At the meeting and talks both sides had a long exhaustive and candid discussion on wide-ranging issues including the conclusion of a peace agreement, the normalization of the bilateral relations, economic and energy assistance and the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Through working and frank discussion the two sides deepened the mutual understanding, narrowed their differences and found not a few common points. They also reached a series of common understandings of the need to resume the six-party talks and the importance of implementing the September 19 Joint Statement.
					
					 Both sides agreed to continue to cooperate with each other in the future to narrow down the remaining differences.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifter Sets New Records at East Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifter Sets New Records at East Asian Games
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK weightlifter Pak Hyon Suk placed first after setting new records in the women's 63 kg category event at the Fifth East Asian Games on Dec. 9.
					Pak lifted 137 kg in jerk and 110 kg in snatch with a total of 247 kg by fully displaying such skills as moment's snatch, quick jerk and successive nimble movement.
					
					 Pak, gold medalist at the 29th Olympic Games and one of 10 top-notch women weightlifters of the world in Juche 97 (2008), lifted 6 kg more than the record of the last Olympic Games or 26 kg more than that lifted by a weightlifter who placed second at the Fifth East Asian Games, thus setting new records in jerk, snatch and total points.

articles.title: Yonggwang Furniture Joint Venture Company
articles.content:
Yonggwang Furniture Joint Venture Company
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Many kinds of quality furniture are made in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to contribute to improving the people's living standard.
					 The Yonggwang Furniture Joint Venture Company, one of the country's leading furniture producers, makes various kinds of furniture, mainly relying on local raw materials.
					
					 It, inaugurated in Juche 82 (1993), is fully equipped with modern machines including a vacuum wood veneer machine and NC wood carver.
					
					 Doors, living room and kitchen fixtures and other household stuff produced by the company are well received for their diversity of shape and kind and for their good quality.
					
					 It mass-produces some 100 varieties of quality furniture, plastic-framed windows of different sizes including three-ply vacuum windows, coating materials of outer and inner walls made of natural materials and glass decorations.
					
					 The products of the company, high in the level of standardization and specialization, are popular in foreign markets, too.
					
					 Recently, the company made versatile furniture convenient in usage to attract the attention of experts.
					
					 The company, through its furniture institute, has developed new and peculiar models of furniture based on advanced technical information and, through its service centre and shop, sold its products and taken orders. 
					
					 It has also made sound reflecting plates requiring advanced technology, theatre seats, stage floorings and other goods ordered.
					
					 It is now concentrating efforts on making new kinds of furniture combining the tastes and physical constitution of the Korean people well with the trend of the time.

articles.title: Phyongsong College of Arts
articles.content:
Phyongsong College of Arts
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Phyongsong College of Arts in South Phyongan Province is one of the famous art educational institutions in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The college, founded in May Juche 63 (1974), has made a contribution to the development of art in the country over the past 35 years by rearing talented reserve artistes.
					
					 Through elaborate education programs, it has brought out many able artistes and art teachers and published textbooks and reference books of value.
					
					 Among awardees in individual contests for February 16 Art Prize and national sketch festivals held in celebration of Feb. 16, there are students of the college.
					
					 Many of its graduates are now active in the State Merited Chorus, Phibada Opera Troupe, State Folk Art Troupe, Mansudae Art Studio and other renowned art and educational institutions.

articles.title: Korean People's Faith in Socialism
articles.content:
Korean People's Faith in Socialism
Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Since the Korean people's faith in socialism is absolute and unshakable, the socialist society of Korea has won victory after victory without vacillation in any adversity.
					Korea's, established by President Kim Il Sung and led by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), is a socialist society realizing the ideal and wish of the popular masses on the basis of the Juche idea.  
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il clearly elucidated the validity and vitality of Juche-oriented theories of socialism in many famous works including "Our Socialism Centered on the Masses Shall Not Perish", "Socialism Is a Science" and "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable".
					
					The Korean people have firmly adhered to their own ideology, line and method of revolution with the faith in socialism.
					
					All the Korean people are advancing towards the future under the Songun-based leadership of the WPK. This is a manifestation of the superiority and inexhaustible viability of Korean-style socialism and the Korean people's unshakable will to entrust their destiny to socialism. 
					
					The Korean people, out of their faith in socialism, have implacably frustrated the reactionary offensives of imperialists holding high the banner of Songun.
					
					The Songun-based politics of the WPK is invincible one proved through rigorous trials of history and a treasured sword for the accomplishment of the cause of socialism.
					
					It is the unwavering belief of the Korean people that thanks to the Songun-based politics the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation are surely defended and the socialist cause of Juche will emerge victorious without fail.
					
					With this faith in socialism, the Korean people are working hard to build a great socialist nation prosperous and powerful, giving a full play to patriotic devotion and popular heroism.
					
					Now the socialist society of Korea is greeting a heyday of prosperity. 
					
					The revolutionary Korean people strong in faith and spirit will further consolidate the Korean-style socialist society as an impregnable fortress under the veteran and experienced leadership of
						
						 Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Stop to Project for "River Improvement" Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Project for "River Improvement" Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- The All-People Measure Committee for Checking the Project of Destroying Four Large Rivers and Protecting Them for Life in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Tuesday in which it demanded an immediate stop to the project for "improving four large rivers", according to MBC of south Korea.
					 The organization referred to the fact that the "Grand National Party" is nowadays rushing the "deliberation on budget" related to the project at the "National Assembly".
					
					 The above-said project, pushed ahead by the authorities, will end in failure without any help for improving the water quality, preventing flood damage and so forth just as in the case of the "restoration of Chonggye Stream", it warned.
					
					 It demanded that the NA make an investigation into the deeds of destroying environment, instead of "deliberating on budget".

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Move to Dispatch Troops under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Move to Dispatch Troops under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- The Democratic Labor Party, "the Democratic Party" and other opposition parties of south Korea protested against the authorities' decision to dispatch troops again to Afghanistan on December 8, according to KBS and MBC of south Korea.
					The opposition parties referred to the fact that the authorities at the Cabinet meeting that day discussed and voted for the issue of dispatching forces of the puppet army including helicopters and unmanned reconnaissance planes to Afghanistan again and decided to present "motion calling for troop dispatch" to the "National Assembly" within this week.
					
					 They denounced the authorities for having decided to dispatch troops on a long-term basis at a time when other countries consider withdrawing their troops from Afghanistan. This can not but be a blind and irresponsible action, they charged.
					
					 They held that they can never agree with the authorities' decision as it was an expression to submit to meaningless death in disregard of security of people.
					
					 The Joint Conference of Civic and Public Organizations against Renewed Dispatch of Troops to Afghanistan made up of 65 civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Citizen's Solidarity for Democratic Society called a press conference in Seoul on the same day to denounce the puppet authorities' decision.
					
					 The organization strongly called for immediately stopping the projected dispatch of troops, an act little short of breaking the promise with the people. It also urged the "National Assembly" not to approve nor connive at the decision of the "government".
					
					 It warned that all the civic and public organizations would launch a fierce struggle to check the renewed dispatch of troops to Afghanistan.

articles.title: KCTU Launches Anti-"government" Struggle
articles.content:
KCTU Launches Anti-"government" Struggle
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) kicked off an anti-"government" struggle across south Korea on Dec. 8 in protest against the suppression of the labor movement. 
					 The organization held a rally in Seoul for "denouncing the collusion behind the closed doors, defending democratic unions and forcing the regime step down". 
					
					 Participants in the rally accused the south Korean Ministry of Labor, the Federation of south Korean Trade Unions and the "General Association of Korean Businessmen" of "agreeing" on Dec. 4 on the "amendment to the Law on Trade Unions" the keynote of which calls for banning the payment of wages to full-time officials of trade unions, etc. 
					
					 They charged that their collusion was aimed to trample down upon the rights of workers and block the activities of trade unions. 
					
					 They declared trade unions in various fields under the KCTU would launch anti- "government" actions one after another with the rally as a prelude. 
					
					 They also stated that they would simultaneously hold mass rallies across south Korea on Dec. 19, in particular, in an effort to escalate their actions. 
					
					 The regional headquarters of the KCTU in different areas such as Taegu, Pusan and Ulsan launched sit-in strikes in protest against the authorities' moves to crack down upon the labor movement on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in France
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in France
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Officials Should Become Genuine Servants Dedicating Themselves to the People" was brought out in booklet on Dec. 3 by the Democrate Publishing House under the Anti-Imperialist Front of France.
					 The work, published on October 28, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the ideas that the officials should become genuine people's servants who are addressed with pronoun "Our" and that they should protect the interests of the people and faithfully serve them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Admired in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Admired in Peru
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Association for the Study of Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk issued a bulletin on December 3 on the occasion of the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine. Carried in the bulletin was a picture of the woman commander of Mt. Paektu.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Life of Kim Jong Suk" highly praised her great exploits, stressing that she made great contribution to the cause of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The bulletin elaborated on the facts that she was born into a poor peasant family in the darkest period of the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and took part in the anti-Japanese armed struggle led by President Kim Il Sung, establishing her fame as the legendary woman commander.
					
					 Even after the liberation of the country she devoted her all to implementing the President's line of building a country, it noted, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Suk dedicated all her life to the people.
					
					 Though she passed away so early, she performed great exploits of eternity in all parts of Korea.
					
					 What is most conspicuous in her exploits is that she educated General Secretary Kim Jong Il in his childhood in ardent patriotism and brought him up to be heir to the President and a great leader who will bear the responsibility for the future of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno fabricas de la ciudad de Kanggye
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno fabricas de la ciudad de Kanggye
Pyongyang, 11 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del  Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno fabricas de la ciudad de Kanggye.
					 El estuvo primero en la Fabrica de Maquinas Herramientas Jangjagang.
					
					 Despues de escuchar explicaciones sobre la modernizacion de la fabrica, recorrio varios talleres y nuevos productos enterandose detalladamente del estado de reconstruccion tecnica y de produccion.
					
					 Diciendo que se renovo radicalmente en un corto tiempo la fisonomia de la fabrica, se realizaron en un alto nivel la modernizacion y la fundamentacion cientifica de todos los procesos productivos y estan en el nivel elevado la cultura productiva y la de vida, reconocio reiteradamente los esfuerzos de los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica que hicieron muchas cosas en un ano.
					
					 Los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores de la fabrica realizaron con asiduo la reconstruccion tecnica conforme a las condiciones practicas de la fabrica apoyandose en sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas y sobrecumplen asi en todos los indices el plan de produccion de la fabrica, dijo y enfatizo que el progreso cientifico y tecnico logrado en ella deviene la demostracion fehaciente de la justeza y vitalidad de la idea del PTC de dar importancia a las ciencias.
					
					 Asevero que si se esfuerzan con teson poniendo en el primer lugar el desarrollo cientifico y tecnico como los obreros de esta fabrica, es posible alcanzar de un tiron cualquier dificil meta cientifico-tecnica.
					
					 Y presento las tareas programaticas que le incumben a la fabrica.
					
					 Subrayo que es preciso seguir impulsando las labores para modernizar y cientifizar la fabrica conforme a la demanda de la epoca de IT y, al mismo tiempo, prestar primordial atencion a la introduccion de ciencias y tecnicas ultramodernas y hay que elevar rapidamente el nivel tecnico y de calificacion de los productores y observar estrictamente la demanda de los reglamentos tecnicos y la norma de operacion.
					
					 A continuacion, el Dirigente estuvo en la Fabrica de Tejidos de Punto de Kanggye.
					
					 Despues de recorrer la sala de presentacion del historial, estuvo en el taller universal, el de tenido, el comedor, el deposito de alimentos subsidiarios y otros lugares enterandose detalladamente del estado de produccion y de intendencia.
					
					 Al ver diversos tejidos de punto en hermosos colores que se producen en cadena, dijo que aunque esta fabrica no es grande y tiene poca mano de obra, contribuye al mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo introduciendo ampliamente nuevas tecnicas y realizando con rentabilidad las gestiones administrativas y elogio el esmerado estilo de vida economica de la fabrica.
					
					 Hay que incrementar incesantemente la produccion porque la solucion del problema de vestido deviene uno de los dos dominios importantes al igual que el problema de comida, recalco y presento las tareas que se presentan ante la fabrica.
					
					 Solo cuando se materialice estrictamente la orientacion del partido de aplicar ampliamente el tricotaje en el dominio de industria ligera, se puede diversificar las vestimentas del pueblo produciendo mucha tela y vestidos con pocas materias primas, apunto y continuo que la fabrica debe producir mucho mas tejidos de punto de buena calidad de varios tipos, que convengan al gusto de nuestro pueblo, para contribuir a la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					 Al escuchar la historia de conducta hermosa de la gerente Kang Song Hwa y otros funcionarios de la fabrica que formaron como dignos innovadores laborales a los huerfanos graduados de la escuela empleandolos en la fabrica y cuidandolos con mucho afecto, califico a ellos de poseedores de excelente personalidad que tienen noble punto de vista de la vida y sublime concepcion de obligacion moral.  
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il oriento seguidamente la Fabrica de Vino de Kanggye.
					
					 Al recorrer varios lugares de la fabrica incluyendo el nuevamente construido taller de cerveza y el almacen, se entero de los detalles del estado de equipos y produccion.
					
					 Se mostro muy satisfecho de que esta fabrica incrementara incesantemente la produccion y haya acondicionado magnificamente nuevos procesos productivos de cerveza, makgoli (licor no refinado) y otros al desplegar energicamente la modernizacion de los procesos productivos y la preparacion de la capacidad.
					
					 Apunto que la fabrica, al desplegar ampliamente el movimiento masivo por la innovacion tecnica y establecer el sistema productivo basado en las materias primas locales, incrementa sin cesar la produccion y asegura estrictamente el principio de rentabilidad en la gestion empresarial.
					
					 Agrego que las experiencias de esta fabrica demuestran que las ciencias y las tecnicas son precisamente la produccion y viceversa.
					
					 Y presento las tareas programaticas que le incumben a esa empresa.
					
					A fin de elevar incesantemente la produccion en la fabrica, es preciso seguir impulsando dinamicamente la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de los procesos productivos y desarrollar persistentemente la labor encaminada a armar con las ciencias y tecnicas ultramodernas a los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos, asevero.
					
					 Para normalizar en un alto nivel la produccion, hay que suministrar suficientemente las materias primas necesarias, dijo y agrego que para este fin, es preciso mejorar las semillas de la uva y realizar bien el abonamiento y cuidado de los cultivos para producir mucha cantidad de esa fruta de buena calidad.
					
					  Enfatizo que dado que esta fabrica tiene larga historia, le es importante mantener el sabor propio del vino, su producto especial.
					
					  Para elevar la calidad de los productos es importante realizar la especializacion de la produccion, subrayo y apunto que hay que desarrollar por separados los procesos productivos de cerveza, makgoli y otros en forma de plantas filiales.
					
					  Los habitantes de la provincia de Jagang acondicionaron con sus propias fuerzas las ciudades y aldeas como paraisos muy felices en aquellos periodos tan dificiles conocidos como la "Marcha penosa" y la forzada y avanzan hoy tambien con el impetu muy elevado poniendose al frente de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera, dijo y envio cordial saludo a todos los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores de la provincia.
					
					  En esta provincia se crean dia y dia los milagros y las proezas que asombran a todo el mundo, asevero y continuo que esta realidad sorprendente es el resultado brillante del gran espiritu de Kanggye y la demostracion del infinito poderio espiritual del pueblo coreano heredero del espiritu del Paektu.
					
					  El Dirigente expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que los trabajadores de la ciudad de Kanggye y otras partes de la provincia de Jagang seguiran cumpliendo excelentemente su papel de vanguardia en la grandiosa lucha por construir una gran potencia prospera.
					
					  El Dirigente fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Pak To Chun, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Jagang, Kim Ki Nam, secretario del CC del PTC, y Kim Kyong Hui, Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek, jefes de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX se refiere al dialogo RPDC-EE.UU.
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX se refiere al dialogo RPDC-EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 11 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Citado por la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea en relacion con la visita a Corea del representante especial de Estados Unidos para la politica sobre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y su comitiva, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 11 la siguiente respuesta:
					 Stephen Bosworth, representante especial de Estados Unidos para la politica sobre la RPDC y su comitiva visitaron a Pyongyang desde el dia 8 hasta el 10.
					
					 Ellos sostuvieron conversaciones con el viceministro coreano de RR.EE. encargado de asuntos de EE.UU. y fueron recibidos por el primer vicecanciller coreano.
					
					Durante ese encuentro y dialogo, ambas partes debatieron sincera y francamente por muchas horas un amplio paquete de problemas como la firma del pacto de paz, la normalizacion de las relaciones, la cooperacion economica y energetica, la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana, etc.
					
					Mediante estos debates practicos y sinceros, ambas partes profundizaron el entendimiento reciproco, limaron los disentimientos y buscaron no pocos puntos comunes. Se logro una serie de comprension comun sobre la necesidad de la reanudacion de las conversaciones a 6 bandas y de la importancia de la implementacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre.
					
					La RPDC y EE.UU. quedaron en seguir cooperando en lo adelante a fin de dirimir las discrepancias pendientes.

articles.title: Pak Hyon Suk establece record en Juegos de Asia Oriental
articles.content:
Pak Hyon Suk establece record en Juegos de Asia Oriental
 Pyongyang, 11 de diciembre (ATCC) -- La pesista coreana Pak Hyon Suk establecio un nuevo record en la division de 63 kilos (f) en los V Juegos de Asia Oriental efectuados el dia 9 y ocupo el primer lugar.
					 La muchacha registro un total de 247 kg al levantar 137 kg en el envion y 110 kg en el arranque mostrando plenamente varias tecnicas.
					
					 Pak, quien es ganadora de medalla de oro en los 29o Juegos Olimpicos y seleccionada como una de 10 pesistas mejores del mundo en el 97 (2008) de la Era Juche, levanto mas 6 kg que el record establecido en los juegos olimpicos pasados y 26 kg que la pesista que ocupo esta vez segundo lugar.
					
					 De esta manera, ella establecio el nuevo record en el envion, el arranque y la clasificacion general.

articles.title: Compania Mixta de Muebles Yonggwang
articles.content:
Compania Mixta de Muebles Yonggwang
Pyongyang, 11 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En Corea se producen los muebles de buena calidad que contribuyen al mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo.
					Sobre todo, la Compania Mixta de Muebles Yonggwang, fundada en el 82 (1993) de la Era Juche, que es una de las bases confiables de la produccion de muebles del pais, produce variados muebles tomando por materias primas principales las maderas domesticas.
					
					La compania esta dotada de las maquinas y equipos modernos como la de chapa fina de madera de vacio, la de xilografia en control digital, etc.
					
					Los productos de la compania incluidos puertas, armarios y muebles de cocina se caracterizan de diferentes formas, generos suficientes, durezas de materiales y buena calidad.
					
					La compania produce en gran cantidad los muebles de buena calidad de mas de cien generos, las triples ventanas plasticas de vacio y otras de varios tipos, las materias de pinturas para el interior y el exterior hechas con materiales naturales y los productos de vidrio para el adorno.
					
					Todos los productos de la compania gozan de buena reputacion en el interior y exterior del pais por alto nivel de la normalizacion, estandarizacion y especializacion.
					
					En estos dias, la compania llama atencion de los especialistas por haber producido los muebles de varias misiones y muy comodos para usar.
					
					 En el instituto de muebles creado en la compania se desarrollan nuevos y especificos muebles a base de la informatica tecnica de punta de muebles y se realizan la venta y el servicio pedido a traves del Centro Combinado de Muebles y Materiales de Construccion Yonggwang y la Tienda de Muebles homonima.
					
					Ademas, la compania produjo en el maximo nivel los muebles domesticos y los productos pedidos necesarios a la tecnica avanzada como placa de reflexion del sonido, las sillas para espectadores del teatro, barricadas del suelo de la escena.
					
					Aspirante a la produccion de muebles al estilo coreano, sigue prestando las fuerzas al desarrollo de los muebles de nuevos generos que combinan organicamente los gustos y constituciones fisicas de habitantes y la corriente de la epoca
